summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6142 for the improvement of Manning Street from 53rd Avenue Southwest to 55th Avenue Southwest; and certain other streets and avenues; by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 85527, and levying assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
